---
title: Formula
---

__Slope-Intercept__:

$$
y
\text{ } = \text{ } 
mx + b
$$

$$ y = \text{y coordinate} $$
$$m = \text{slope}$$
$$ x = \text{x coordinate} $$
$$b = \text{y intercept}$$


----

__Point-Slope__: 

$$
y - y_{1} 
\text{ } = \text{ } 
m(x-x_{1})
$$


$$ y = \text{y coordinate of second point} $$
$$ y_{1} = \text{y coordinate of point one} $$
$$m = \text{slope}$$
$$ x = \text{x coordinate of second point} $$
$$ x_{1} = \text{x coordinate of point one} $$

----

### Limit Definition

$$
f'(x) 
\text{ } = \text{ }
\lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h) - f(x)}{h}
$$
